You set the goal, Modev does the rest.

Learn More Get Involved

Technology moves at the speed of light -- Modev puts your initiatives at the tip of the spear. With nearly a decade of experience, Modev is a trusted technology community builder, producing powerful and engaging events. We’ve partnered with some of the largest brands in the world for multi-city, 1-day tours bringing together technologists and developers to learn, create and engage. The community building doesn’t stop there. Our team of specialists will create strategic plans to nurture and engage long after the skills building ends.

Start with Goals and Objectives

We start by learning your goals and objectives: What is the breadth of your project? What solutions and expertise are you seeking? What marketplace do you want to reach? What industry gap does your product fill?

Target and Recruit the Right Attendees

Once we understand your objectives, we reach out to our diverse community of partners and professionals, and identify the companies and individuals who can fulfill your needs.

Execute an Effective Hackathon

Modev supports each of our partners throughout the Hackathon. As your partner, we will execute on-site logistics, facilitate collaboration and professional networking, and a foster a collaborative vision for your product’s potential.
